widewings.heading: Wide Wings Media
description: Hired as a freelance fullstack developer to redesign ticketkhidakee.com, managed by Wide Wings Media. Replaced their existing PHP-Laravel stack with a Python-Django stack.
Implemented a ticket booking system, payment gateway, and event management system.
Designed a cloud architecture to handle extreme bursts in traffic, deployed on AWS resources.

mastercard.heading: MasterCard
description: Wrote an internal protocol to facilitate event serialization format translation between protocol buffers and AVRO-based schemas for event-driven applications.

coepidealabs.heading: Student Researcher, COEP IDEA Labs
description: Worked in an interdisciplinary team to build data acquisition robots for collecting leaf and soil data for soyabean plants in Indian farms.
Designed a rover-like robot to be driven between rows of crops, and a hand-held device to capture data for farms too dense for the rover.

coepweb.heading: COEP Webteam
description: Maintained the college website and its on-prem servers. Managed a Drupal based CMS and coordinated with various other clubs, faculty, and staff to keep the website up to date.
